document_data.name: Black Adder Stew
document_data.mainbody: '''Black adder stew''' was a local delicacy served at the [[Slithering Serpent Inn]] in the city of [[Hlondeth]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, [[Adamar Session]], [[Bard]] of [[Starmantle]], visited the Slithering Serpent Inn during his twelve-year adventuring trek across the Reach. Black adder stew was highly recommended by Adamar in his guide book to the Vilhon Reach.
